title: UPSC TORTOISE 2-Year Foundation
features: Early Start for Beginners – Ideal for college students or 12th pass aspirants.
Step-by-Step Prep – From NCERT basics to full GS + Prelims + Mains + CSAT coverage.
Daily Live Classes + Tests – 2-hour sessions, weekly tests, answer writing & current affairs.
Full Mentorship & Support – Personal guidance, study tracking, and hybrid learning options.

title: UPSC IGNITE 1-Year Foundation
features: Full UPSC Coverage – GS, CSAT, Essay, and Current Affairs in 12 months.
Top Mentors & Daily Guidance – IIT/NIT faculty with 1:1 mentorship and daily answer writing.
Integrated Learning – NCERT to advanced GS + regular tests, current affairs, and ethics prep.
Extra Benefits – Prelims qualifier refund, free extension till 2027 for old students, and full revision.

title: NCERT Sudharshan Chakra
features: Perfect for Beginners – Designed for 12th pass-outs, college students, and freshers.
Core NCERT Focus – Covers Class 6–12 NCERTs with UPSC mapping and concept clarity.
Daily Classes + Tests – 2-hour sessions, weekly quizzes, full-length NCERT tests.
Mentorship & Transition – Personal guidance and smooth shift to GS Foundation Course.

title: Catch The Wind Course
features: Current Affairs Mastery – Covers July 2025–April 2026 from top UPSC sources with GS & static linkage.
Mentor-Led Prep – Weekly answer writing + 1-on-1 mentorship, reviews, and strategy building.
Weekly Tests – MCQ + Mains-based current affairs tests with regular feedback.
Prelims-Focused Phase – April–May revision, tests & elimination techniques for UPSC Prelims 2026.

title: UPSC Fodo Batch
features: Intensive Crash Course – Fast-track preparation for serious aspirants with limited time.
Strategic Focus Areas – High-yield topics, previous year analysis, and exam pattern mastery.
Smart Study Techniques – Memory tricks, time management, and efficient revision methods.
Results-Oriented Approach – Mock tests, performance analytics, and targeted improvement plans.

title: Hits the Bulls Eye Mentorship Batch
features: Precision Target Training – Laser-focused preparation for specific UPSC weak areas and strengths.
Expert Shot Analysis – Detailed performance breakdown with personalized improvement strategies.
Bullseye Practice Sessions – High-intensity mock tests and rapid-fire question solving techniques.
Championship Mentality – Confidence building, exam psychology, and winning mindset development.
